thread.title: A Charmer on Via Firenze
thread.title_full: A Charmer on Via Firenze - Review of Hotel Oceania, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Clark845
title: A Charmer on Via Firenze
text: I became aware of this small hotel thru Rick Steves guide to Rome and fell in love on my own. The hotel is just a short walk from Roma Termini on Via Firenze. It is a couple of blocks away from the hustle and bustle of Via Nazionale in It's own quiet corner. The hotel occupies a floor in a mixed use building. The rooms are a nice size and feature updated bathrooms. Breakfast is included in the price and there is a patio where you can relax with your juice and pastry. After an afternoon of sightseeing the patio is a nice place to wind down with a bottle of wine. Highly recommended.
